title: VATPAVE Mens Summer Striped Shirts Button Down Short Sleeve Vintage Beach Hawaiian Shirts with Pocket
description: Material: Mens button down short sleeve shirt is made of of 95% polyester and 5% spandex, with its breathable and lightweight fabric, ensuring soft and comfortable feel against the skin.

Classic Design: The ribbed textured shirt features striped design and curved hemline that adds a touch of fashion sense, and has one chest pocket that is covenient to hold small items, regular fit shirts are suitable for most people, simple but classic, it never goes out of style.
Versatile: Mens hawaiian shirts short sleeve could be easy to match with jeans, casual pants or shorts to create a simple but fashionable style.

Occasion: Suitable for all occasions and seasons like holiday, birthday, beach, cruise, informal business, vacation, date, wedding, daily casual, office, school, camping, party and travel.It's a great present for yourself, your friends and your husband.
Garment Care: Machine Washable,Do Not Bleach,Tumble Dry Low.Machine wash with cold water setting keeps colors vibrant and ensures long-lasting durability.
